extensionDescription.message: Uses machine learning to predict your browsing patterns and pre-cache upcoming pages to speed up browsing.

popupStatusActive.description: Status shown when the extension is active.

popupStatusInactive.description: Status shown when the extension is inactive.

optionsBatteryMode.description: Setting for behavior when on battery power.

optionsResetButton.description: Button to reset settings to defaults.

optionsWhitelist.description: List of sites where prefetching is allowed.

optionsBlacklist.description: List of sites where prefetching is disabled.

optionsDescription.message: Configure how PreCache Predictor works to optimize your browsing experience.

optionsGeneral.description: Header for the general settings section.

optionsPrefetchLevelDesc.message: Determine how aggressively pages should be prefetched
optionsPrefetchLevelDesc.description: Description for the prefetch level setting.

optionsBatterySaving.description: Label for the battery saving mode setting.

optionsBatterySavingDesc.message: Limit prefetching when battery is low (below 30%)
optionsBatterySavingDesc.description: Description for the battery saving mode setting.

optionsDataSaverDesc.description: Description for the data saver mode setting.

optionsUrlFilters.description: Header for the URL filters section.

optionsWhitelistDesc.message: Only prefetch pages from these domains (leave empty to prefetch all domains)

optionsBlacklistDesc.message: Never prefetch pages from these domains

optionsDomainsHint.message: Enter domain names separated by commas
optionsDomainsHint.description: Hint for the domain name input.

optionsStatsTotalTime.description: Label for the total time saved statistic.

optionsStatsPrefetchedPages.description: Label for the prefetched pages statistic.

optionsStatsSuccessfulPrefetches.description: Label for the successful prefetches statistic.

optionsStatsHitRate.description: Label for the success rate statistic.

optionsResetStats.description: Label for the reset statistics button.

optionsAdvanced.description: Header for the advanced settings section.

optionsDataExport.description: Label for the data management section.

optionsDataExportDesc.message: Export or import your settings and data
optionsDataExportDesc.description: Description for the data management section.

optionsExportData.description: Label for the export data button.

optionsImportData.description: Label for the import data button.

optionsResetAll.description: Label for the reset all section.

optionsResetAllDesc.message: Reset all settings and data to default values
optionsResetAllDesc.description: Description for the reset all section.

optionsResetAllButton.description: Label for the reset all button.

optionsSave.description: Label for the save settings button.
